attributes.action: Change my vote in the EU Referendum to Remain
attributes.additional_details:
The UK voted to leave the EU by a majority of 1,269,501. Should more than 634,751 people sign this petition then the government must hold a second referendum.

The creator of this petition voted to Remain and asks those who no longer wish to leave to express their desire to change their vote to Remain a member of the European Union.
attributes.background: We the undersigned voted to Leave the European Union, however after further consideration, wish to change our vote to Remain in the European Union.
